mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter by C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated December 28, 1861, to “My Dear Ellen,” sent from “Camp near Union Mills” by C. M. Stigleman. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
